typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		cdatetime as string,
		address as string,
		district as string,
		beat as string,
		grid as string,
		crimedescr as string,
		ucr_ncic_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		policyID as string,
		statecode as string,
		county as string,
		eq_site_limit as string,
		hu_site_limit as string,
		fl_site_limit as string,
		fr_site_limit as string,
		tiv_2011 as string,
		tiv_2012 as string,
		eq_site_deductible as string,
		hu_site_deductible as string,
		fl_site_deductible as string,
		fr_site_deductible as string,
		point_latitude as string,
		point_longitude as string,
		line as string,
		construction as string,
		point_granularity as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source(output(
		id as string,
		Name as string,
		Salary as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source3
source1 select(mapColumn(
		cdatetime,
		address
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
source2 select(mapColumn(
		policyID,
		statecode,
		county
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
source3 select(mapColumn(
		id,
		Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select1, Select2 join(cdatetime == policyID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, Select3 join(cdatetime == Name,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
